venue.name: William J Connel Memorial Rink and Pool

item.description:
Please join us for a new winter event. Indoor adult lap swimming.

Showers and changing area available in locker room. No lockers available, but bags are allowed in the pool area on the shelves or benches. 1/2 the pool is used for swim team practice, the other half open, but pretty quiet at the pool at 7pm. Lifeguards on site.
*remember pool shoes or flip flops and a bag for your wet suit, and maybe an extra towel to dry off with when you change.

Connell Memorial Swimming Pool (Mass Dept of Conservation and Recreation- DCR, formerly MDC)
220 Broad Street
Weymouth, MA 02188
781 335 2090

Admission is FREE at all DCR managed pools.

Thursday, December 16th at 7pm.
Pool is open until 9pm

We will meet in the pool area.

Pool schedule (per DCR website):
Open from October 9th through the end of May.
Hours:

7am to 3pm Open Swim
6pm to 9pm Adult Swim
